author: The Standard
title: Ground News - Nadal puts positive spin on Open pullout
text: Nadal puts positive spin on Open pullout Summary by The Standard [Rafael Nadal](https://ground.news/interest/rafael-nadal)yesterday pulled out of the Australian Open with a "micro tear on a muscle" barely a week after making his comeback, but said he remained positive. The 37-year-old Spanish great had been out of the game since injuring his hip at the 2023 Australian Open, undergoing surgery before making... More Filters Filters 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right [] The Standard Nadal puts positive spin on Open pullout Rafael Nadal yesterday pulled out of the Australian Open with a "micro tear on a muscle" barely a week after making his comeback, but said he remained positive.
